faq1Page.faqTitle1: How to install Exclusive Addons Plugin?
faq1Page.faqContent1: As far as our Plugin is concerned, it works smoothly with all of the WordPress themes. But if you are looking for a clean, lightweight, minimal, and fully customizable WordPress theme for your site we recommend Credence. multipurpose theme
faq1Page.faqTitle2: Do you recommend any WordPress theme?
faq1Page.faqContent2: As far as our Plugin is concerned, it works smoothly with all of the WordPress themes. But if you are looking for a clean, lightweight, minimal, and fully customizable WordPress theme for your site we recommend Credence. multipurpose theme

about.description: A Bodok Tetőfedő Mester több évtizede foglalkozik tetőfedéssel és felújítással. Szakértelemmel, garanciával és megbízhatósággal állunk ügyfeleink szolgálatában.
listItems: Garancia minden elvégzett munkára és anyagra.
